data.title: Section 2: NGS library preparation for sequencing
data.title_html: Section 2: NGS library preparation for sequencing

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"edv5s","text":"We adapted the SureSelect XT HS2 DNA protocol to prepare libraries using as input material samples after single-cell Whole Genome Amplification (scWGA), instead of genomic DNA samples, for library preparation for Illumina single-cell Whole Genome Sequencing (scWGS). This protocol can be employed either manually (Section 2: Option A) or in combination with automation using the Bravo Automated Liquid Handling Platform (Section 2: Option B).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: Aligning Science Across Parkinson’s through the Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson’s Research (MJFF)

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"da376","text":"We have used this protocol for DNA products after single-cell Whole Genome Amplification (scWGA) by either PicoPLEX (Takara), ResolveDNA (BioSkryB) and droplet MDA (Samplix). We recommend to bead purify the PicoPLEX and ResolveDNA products prior library preparation. In all cases, the amplicon quantity and size should be assessed using Qubit and TapeStation or other methods prior to SureSelect XT HS2 DNA library preparation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2796r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evo5m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7d590","text":"Bravo error/notification messages","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bafa3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"o871","text":"Two error/notification messages are encountered when VWorks Bravo software is initializing: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fn76","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"avboi","text":"1. If you encounter the G-axis error message shown below, select Ignore and Continue, leaving device in current state.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9qa09","text":"  2. If you encounter the W-axis error message shown below, select Retry.
